name: Vice City Race
description:
How about a race? Welcome to the world of speed and adrenaline, welcome in Vice City Race!

This is the place where you can see what you have never seen before. The main hero is a bunny at the wheel of a car that races with his friends around the city.

Everyone is properly prepared and equipped, therefore it is also allowed to perform stunts and use Nitrogen for better performance. Your main mission is to help the bunny to reach the finish line first under any condition, even if it means eliminating some participants.

Together we are the team!

Game Features :
- 20 levels
- Daily Rewards
- Max. speed 65km/h
